data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: When she was selling flowers, at least she didn't have to sell herself. She doesn't want ____ rely ____ a ____ man, but ____ to ____ a ____ man, Freddy. She ____ she ____ make ____ of ____. She values love more than anything else.
data.partBlankContent: When she was selling flowers, at least she didn't have to sell herself. She doesn't want t_ rely o_ a ri__ man, but dec____ to ma___ a po__ man, Freddy. She sa__ she c__ make some_____ of h__. She values love more than anything else.
data.fullContent: When she was selling flowers, at least she didn't have to sell herself. She doesn't want to rely on a rich man, but decides to marry a poor man, Freddy. She says she can make something of him. She values love more than anything else.
data.answer: 当她卖花的时候，至少她不必出卖自己。她不想依靠一个富人，但决定嫁给一个穷人，弗雷迪。她说她能使他有所成就。她把爱看得比什么都重要。
